hotels.title: Tranquil Vineyard Glamping Retreat near Brisbane with Cellar Door
hotels.description: Indulge your senses and reconnect with nature during a stay amid the tranquility of the Australian bush at Sanctuary by Sirromet on Mount Cotton, where you’ll find luxurious tented suites and pavilions located on the grounds of Sirromet Winery. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, Sanctuary by Sirromet offers high-class amenities, award-winning wines and a peaceful setting. Spend balmy evenings on your private deck overlooking the sparkling laguna, with the serene silence only interrupted by the rustling of the trees, scampering local fauna and the clink of wine glasses as you toast to your escape. The best part? You’re perfectly positioned on a luscious vineyard for a tipple of award-winning Granite Belt wine. When you're not savouring the fruits of the land, the two onsite restaurants will take your tastebuds on a culinary journey.
